lines.text: Admiral, I could almost kiss you.
You try it, and you'll find I have only begun to fight.
You know what you are, Windy? You're the man behind the woman behind the man behind the gun.
I wish that I had been born twelve minutes earlier than you, and I'd have had all the brains.

[With a whiskey flask]
I got something here that'll warm us up but quick. Have one?
Well, down the hatch as you sailors say.

[Looking at the flask]
Hah! That's the stiff that puts waves on your permanent.
